original_title: Le Soulèvement de la jeunesse Mai 68
overview: Maurice Lemaître had the ambition to make a really creative film about the revolt of May 68.  For this, he did not renounce any of his filmic audacities and he managed to plunge into this new thematic dimension the cinematographic inventions put in In its previous achievements.
title: Le Soulèvement de la jeunesse Mai 68
